titles.title: National Healthcare Acquired Infection and Medical Error Transparency Act
National Healthcare Acquired Infection and Medical Error Transparency Act
To amend the Public Health Service Act to ensure transparency within the health care system through the establishment of a National Healthcare Acquired Infection and Medical Error Reporting Program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services

bill.summary:
National Healthcare Acquired Infection and Medical Error Transparency Act
This bill establishes a program to collect confidential reports from health care providers that detail instances of health care-acquired infections and medical errors.
It also establishes the Office of Patient Safety and Health Care Quality within the Department of Health and Human Services to administer the program.
